$learning_note.value: Marketing, as discussed in the video [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QusJ4fpWQwA), is the process of promoting and selling products or services by communicating their value to potential clients. It encompasses both traditional and modern approaches. Traditional marketing, such as billboards and TV ads, focuses on brand awareness but struggles with tracking ROI and often targets uninterested audiences. In contrast, modern marketing, particularly digital marketing, leverages the internet and social media to precisely target and engage potential customers, offering measurable ROI. Key digital marketing strategies include SEO, SEM, email marketing, social media marketing, and affiliate marketing. The video emphasizes the importance of digital marketing skills for various career paths and offers resources for further learning.
